title: Stories Podchats #1: Dogs, Cats, and the King
description:
In this episode Amanda and Dan answer your questions! This is the first in our new series of Stories Podchats, available on our Patreon at Patreon.com/stories. We talk about our pets, dog king inspiration, and our favorite mythical creatures!

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
